summary: Completed testing of workshop management application third iteration. Backend APIs working perfectly (17/17 tests passed). Authentication and navigation working correctly. CRITICAL: Modal overlay issue is NOT fixed despite main agent's claims. Equipment registration workflow remains completely broken due to modal overlay intercepting pointer events.

ui_bugs.issue: Modal overlay still intercepts pointer events preventing form interaction after adding brand/model/client - SAME ISSUE AS ITERATIONS 1 & 2
ui_bugs.selector: HTML element intercepts pointer events, overlay elements still present in DOM
ui_bugs.details: Despite main agent's claimed fix (close modal before API call + setTimeout 100ms), the modal overlay remains active and blocks further interactions. Error: '<html lang="en">…</html> intercepts pointer events'. Brand was added successfully but dropdown becomes unclickable. Overlay check confirms 'Overlay elements still present'.

integration_issues.issue: Complete equipment registration workflow broken due to persistent modal overlay issue
integration_issues.details: Users cannot complete equipment registration because they cannot interact with dropdowns after adding brands, models, or clients via modals. The fix applied by main agent is ineffective.

passed_tests: User login functionality with created credentials
Dashboard loading and module navigation cards display
Navigation between modules (Inicio, Entrada, Revisión, Salida)
Equipment Entry page loading and initial form display
Modal opening functionality (brand, model, client modals open correctly)
Data creation via modals (brands, models, clients are created successfully)
Authentication state management and protected routes

success_percentage.frontend: 30% (authentication and navigation working, but core equipment workflow completely broken due to unfixed modal overlay issue)

action_item_for_main_agent: CRITICAL: Modal overlay issue is STILL NOT FIXED. The setTimeout approach is ineffective. The modal overlay elements remain in DOM and continue intercepting pointer events after modal operations. Need to properly remove overlay elements from DOM or set pointer-events: none on overlay after modal closes. Current fix (close modal + setTimeout + API call) does not resolve the core issue. Equipment registration workflow is completely unusable.
